ComicInfo.Title: Order from Chaos, Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
A new age begins for the TMNT. The epic events of TMNT #50 have created new opportunity… and dangers. Will the family stay united in the face of a devastating new foe?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ken Garing | 1 | Sub | Artist's Edition Subscription Sketch Cover | None | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Kevin Eastman | 3 | RE | Fried Pie/BAM!/2nd & Charles Exclusive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 4 | RE | Rhode Island Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Ian Nichols | 5-7 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 00:26:42. [CVDB504361]
ComicInfo.Writer: Kevin Eastman, Bobby Curnow, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Ian Nichols, Ken Garing, Kevin Eastman, Tomi Varga
ComicInfo.Characters: Alex Winter, Alopex, Angel, April O'Neil, Bebop, Bludgeon , Darius Dun, Donatello, Harold Lillja, Jammer, Jennika, Karai, Kitsune, Koya, Leonardo, Master Splinter, Maze, Michelangelo, Mondo Gecko, Raphael, Rocksteady, Shredder, Turk
